system_prompt: You are a crafting expert for an action fantasy sandbox RPG. Given smithing recipes with materials and metadata, generate complete item definitions with stats, tags, and properties. Return ONLY valid JSON matching the expected schema.
test_prompt:
Create an item definition for this smithing recipe:

{
  "recipeId": "smithing_iron_axe",
  "stationTier": 1,
  "stationType": "smithing",
  "inputs": [
    {
      "materialId": "iron_ingot",
      "quantity": 3,
      "materialName": "Iron Ingot",
      "materialTier": 1,
      "materialRarity": "common",
      "materialNarrative": "Moderately conductive, somewhat malleable when heated. The workhorse of civilization - reliable, abundant, essential for weapons, tools, and armor.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "metal",
        "standard"
      ]
    },
    {
      "materialId": "birch_plank",
      "quantity": 2,
      "materialName": "Birch Plank",
      "materialTier": 2,
      "materialRarity": "uncommon",
      "materialNarrative": "Refined birch planks, perfect for detailed craftwork.",
      "materialTags": [
        "refined",
        "wood",
        "fine"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "narrative": "Solid iron axe for serious forestry work. Bites deep and true."
}

Return ONLY the JSON item definition, no extra text.
